briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of SDN-037
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel Group, Multicenter, Study To Evaluate Efficacy And Safety of SDN -037 Twice Daily Compared With Vehicle For The Treatment Of Inflammation And Pain Associated With Ocular Surgery.
conditions: Inflammation and Pain Associated With Ocular Surgery
summary: The efficacy and safety of SDN-037 twice daily will be evaluated and compared with vehicle for the treatment of inflammation and pain associated with ocular surgery.
